questions.question_text: Which unique identifier allows network traffic to be routed to a host?

An engineer is creating an API to automatically obtain specific zones from Cisco Meraki MV cameras. The data that is provided when the API runs must represent the current analytic zones that are configured on the cameras. The API must start automatically at 6 p.m. every day and save the data on a server for further processing. Which part of the HTTP request must be configured to meet these requirements?

choices.C: request header with Content-Type set to "application/json"
choices.A: request body with Status Code set to "302"
choices.B: request body with Content-Type set to "application/xml"
choices.D: request header with Content-Encoding set to "application/xml"

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
The only one that makes sense

questions.question_text: A developer has created a three-tier web application for network device control and management. The application consists of multiple objects assigned for different functionalities. The architecture of the application is based on the Observer pattern. Which advantage does this pattern provide for the application design and architecture?

choices.B: It updates the state of dependent subjects directly.
choices.C: One observer can query the state of other subjects
choices.D: It decouples the subjects from the observers.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
The Observer pattern promotes loose coupling between the subjects (the network devices or their controllers) and the observers (components interested in the devices' state changes).

Selected Answer: D
The Observer pattern decouples the subjects from the observers. 
The separation is achived by loose coupling, independence and dynamic registration.

Selected Answer: A
Subject
it is object being observed = the data that is to be synchronized□
Subject has a registration process that allows other components to
subscribe to the process
□
Once registered, a subscriber is sent an update notification whenever there
is a change in the subject's data
□
▪
Observer
Component that registers with the subject□
Only function is to synchronize its data with the subject when called□
Doesn't use a pulling process, updates are push only
